name: Root Maker
description:
Welcome to Root Maker ©, the world’s greatest currency exchange software.

You have just been hired as a currency trader. Congratulations! Currency is now your life. Root Maker © will guide you to unprecedented success in your new career. Money is the root of all good things, and Root is the best type of money there is.

Instructions

  • Buy and sell currencies to gain more Root.
  • Exchange rates tell you how much of that currency makes up 1 Root.
  • On the Buy screen, enter how much Root you want to spend to buy that currency.
  • On the Sell screen, enter how much of that currency you want to sell back for Root.

Rumor has it that Root Maker © rewards high performers, and that if you make enough Root, you may end up with some extra options…

Credit:

  • @joe-bustamante, @dtkelch, @andyp, and @jason-porritt on programming
  • @jason-porritt on the audio
  • @kyle-harris-ao on the interface and design

Built with Phaser 3.
